no_support_set_search.en: {} is not a supported search type

oof_cookie_error.cn: 获取115签名失败，请检查是否填入正确的cookies
oof_cookie_error.en: Failure to get 115 signiture, check cookies are correct

oof_code99.cn: 错误代码99，请重新登陆115并填入新的cookies

oof_code911.cn: 错误911，请手动添加{magnet}或者通过115验证并重试

oof_magnet_exists.en: magnet for {car} already exists, please delete existing magnet to continue
oof_magnet_exists.cn: {car}磁链已存在于115, 请删除后重试

oof_no_task_found.en: download {car} failed on: cannot find download task from first page of magnet task; please visit 115 and clean up pending tasks
oof_no_task_found.cn: {}添加磁链失败: 无法在离线下载第一页找到下载任务, 请前往115清理失败或者正在进行的任务

oof_no_file.en: there is no download file found in 115 task
oof_no_file.cn: 磁链任务内找不到可下载的文件(未完成/文件未达到100MB)

oof_general_failure.en: download {car} failed after {retry_num} of retries due to {e}
oof_general_failure.cn: 经过{retry_num}次重试, {car}下载失败, 原因: {e}

oof_cookies_not_found.en: 115 cookies does not exist or is not setup correctly
oof_cookies_not_found.cn: 115 cookies 文件不存在或没有正确设置, 请前往配置表单更新

aria2_setup_error.en: not all aria2 fields are setup correctly
aria2_setup_error.cn: 无效的aria2设置, 请检查3个相关设置已正确填入

aria2_wrong_server.en: cannot connect to server due to incorrect server address
aria2_wrong_server.cn: 无法连接至aria2服务器, 请检查正确设置了服务器参数

aria2_cannot_contact_server.en: cannot add url to server, please verify aria2 server is running or the setup is correct
aria2_cannot_contact_server.cn: 无法添加任务至aria2服务器, 请检查服务器正在运行并正确设置了所有服务器参数
